item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, December 14, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] The London problem is holding young Brits back
2. South Korean president vows to ‘never give up’ after impeachment vote
3. Porsche holding company warns of writedown in Volkswagen stake of up to €20bn
4. Jaguar’s rebrand has divided opinion. Is ‘Project Roar’ the road to success?
5. Concern grows over mysterious drone sightings along US east coast
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, December 14, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
